apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: debug-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: debug
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: debug
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: debug
        image: python:latest
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - tail -f /dev/null
        env:
        - name: KEY_Name
            value: Value    
        - name: KEY_Name2
            valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
                name: secret-name
                key: secret_id
title: Debug python app on container/pod
